attributes.background: Redroofs Nursery in Bristol has recently been issued a 6 week suspension by Ofsted. As parents we would like to show our support for the reopening of the nursery.

rejection.details:
The issue you raise is the responsibility of Bristol City Council, not of the UK Government or Parliament. You could start a new petition about this issue with Bristol City Council using the link below: 

http://epetitions.bristol.gov.uk/epetition_core/community/petitions
